story_name: Sam Altman and the Great GPU Hunt (Revised for Generation Models)
story_overview: Sam Altman, frustrated by a GPU shortage, decides to find GPUs at a local supermarket. With simple readable signs and expressive actions, this short comedy tells a clear, visual story without complex motion or text.

video_prompts: Inside a modern office, Sam Altman looks at a glowing monitor showing big bold letters 'GPU ALERT'. He leans forward with a thoughtful, slightly stressed face. The room has soft blue light and computer screens around.
Sam picks up his jacket and keys with a determined expression. On the desk, a sticky note reads 'Buy GPUs'. Sunlight shines in through the window as he heads toward the door.
Outside the OpenAI office, Sam sits in a small electric car. He smiles slightly and drives off through a calm city street.

Close on desk: hand grabbing jacket and keys; sticky note clearly reading 'Buy GPUs'; warm sunlight across the tabletop, determined posture.
Curbside exterior: compact electric car with the man in the driver’s seat; faint smile, calm city street beyond, gentle departure mood.

video_prompts: Wide shot of a bright supermarket entrance with a big sign above reading 'SUPER MARKET'. Sam walks in pushing a shopping cart, looking focused.
In the electronics aisle, Sam picks up a shiny toaster and tilts his head curiously. A small paper tag beside it reads 'GPU 5090' in big letters. He looks intrigued.
A friendly store employee gestures toward another aisle labeled 'VEGETABLES'. Sam nods with hope and pushes his cart in that direction.

video_prompts: Sam stands in front of a shelf of green cans labeled 'Green Pea Units (GPU)' in bold letters. He holds one can close, puzzled but amused.
Sam pushes his cart filled with toasters, lamps, and green cans. He looks proud, walking through the aisle as customers glance curiously.

video_prompts: At the checkout counter, Sam places his strange items — toasters, green cans, and chips — on the belt. A visible sign on a chip bag reads 'GPU FLAVOR'.
The cashier looks confused while scanning items. Sam nods proudly, standing tall beside the pile. People in the background look amused.
Outside the supermarket at sunset, Sam pushes a cart full of glowing appliances and 'GPU FLAVOR' chips. He looks satisfied, gazing upward with a calm smile.
